name: Voltage War - Alpha Release
description:
Voltage War is a turn-based strategy game where the players control an army with or without a commander. The commander can use special powers and have different traits which affects their armies.


Nataliya, a newly recruited Commander for the nation of Purple Haze

In the alpha demo the campaign features 10 maps. These maps handle the first part of the full-scale campaign. The nation Purple Haze, defending from a sudden invasion from the nation of Dark Wolf. You can unlock 6 commanders to use when playing the Battle Room mode. To unlock more content in the game, use your battle points earned by completing a map.

Read more at our website
